mapper.select: SELECT seqno, bank_name, account, carno, user_name,name, reg_id, recv_date, memo FROM bank_account ba LEFT JOIN USER us ON ba.reg_id=us.nickname ORDER BY seqno
mapper.update: UPDATE bank_account AS ba, (SELECT account FROM bank_account WHERE used_code='0' LIMIT 1) AS ac SET used_code = '1', recv_date = now(), reg_id = #{reg_id} WHERE ba.account=ac.account AND used_code = '0'
